fields.name: Description
fields.value: Compare the address in the second operand with the lower bound in bnd. The second operand can be either a register or memory operand. If the address is lower than the lower bound in bnd.LB, it will set BNDSTATUS to 01H and signal a #BR exception.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: This instruction does not cause any memory access, and does not read or write any flags.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
